title.rendered: Haven’t received the latest stimulus check? Your questions answered.

content.rendered: Many taxpayers have questions surrounding their Economic Impact Payments (EIP). What to do if they haven’t received their latest stimulus check? Do they qualify to receive the full amount? How can they check the status of their payment? Affordable CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Phillip Hwang provide answers to some of the most important questions Americans have regarding Economic Impact Payments.
